name: Bio-Rad Laboratories, Inc.
description: Bio-Rad Laboratories, Inc. is a global leader in life science research and clinical diagnostics, dedicated to advancing scientific discovery and healthcare. Founded in 1952, Bio-Rad has established a strong reputation for its innovative products that support the research and clinical laboratories in their efforts to improve patient care and accelerate scientific progress. The company operates through two main segments: Life Science and Clinical Diagnostics. The Life Science segment provides a wide range of products for research, including reagents, instruments, and consumables for applications in genomics, proteomics, and cell biology. The Clinical Diagnostics segment focuses on products that support the diagnosis and monitoring of diseases, including immunology, clinical chemistry, and molecular diagnostics. Bio-Rad is committed to quality and innovation, continuously investing in research and development to meet the evolving needs of scientists and healthcare professionals. With a global presence, Bio-Rad serves customers in more than 150 countries, ensuring that critical research and diagnostic work can be performed efficiently and effectively. The company’s mission is to provide high-quality products that empower laboratories to make important scientific breakthroughs and improve patient outcomes worldwide.
